text: Avoid the DELL Inspiron i7559-2512BLK Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 8 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB GDDR5 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 960 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 960. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the DELL Inspiron i7559-2512BLK Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 8 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB GDDR5 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit!

Had several issues with the DELL Inspiron i7559-2512BLK Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 8 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB GDDR5 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit since day one. blue screens occasionally and the fan noise feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 960 is good, but I expected a bit more from the screen brightness on the DELL Inspiron i7559-2512BLK Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 8 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB GDDR5 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the DELL Inspiron i7559-2512BLK Gaming Laptop Intel Core i7 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 8 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 4 GB GDDR5 15.6" 1920 x 1080 Windows 10 Home 64-Bit. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
